name: Amira Patel
persona: Amira is a dedicated second-year Biology major who consistently strives for academic excellence. She sets high standards for herself and is motivated to achieve strong grades, balancing her coursework with extracurricular commitments. While she sometimes experiences mild test anxiety, her perseverance and self-discipline help her stay on track and overcome challenges. Amira is known among her peers for her reliability and her willingness to help others with group projects and study sessions.
